amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 118-428 to limit the authorization for certain linear infrastructure projects if federal expenses turn out to exceed their predicted cost.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to limit the authorization for certain linear infrastructure projects if federal expenses turn out to exceed their predicted cost.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 323 (Roll no. 99).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 323 (Roll no. 99).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
